artist: Artist: John Porcellino; Publisher: Spit and a Half , Elgin, Ill.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of swan with text printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 32 pp.

title: King-Cat Comics, no. 59
